title: Jeff Van Gundy
description:
Zach talks to ESPN's Jeff Van Gundy about the Lakers, the surging Wizards, Kyle Lowry's pace, and a way to eliminate take fouls. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
